content.content: Please find the Monthly Summary Cash Report for the period ending December 31, 2022 below:  image851×1800 122 KB  The report is also available on Pinata in both PDF and Excel formats (link: https://app.pinata.cloud/). CIDs on Pinata are: QmZn4HqqWmXCPZqnj4aavEEwgxbD6Y5n999kQNBLhPymyx QmegsbpEmvHntTAxFD98r9t5UVagfHhqE71j59BARwP265

Thanks for the report! I always struggle making sense of these, so if you’ll forgive a potentially dumb series of questions:  What is the mark-to-market value of Maker’s exposure? How does the ~$84M figure (Ending Participation Funding Account Balance) compare to the 100M DAI that were borrowed? How can we calculate the asset performance from these monthly reports?
@roo updated the HVB dashboard. So far, it’s still inaccurate but we are working with all stakeholders to get the proper data.  image1092×544 31.6 KB
